text:
neighbourhood bcm/fishball noods stall

last time here, the sauce mix was a bit bland but today, a lot better. think they gave more sambal and soy.

noodles springy and mushrooms had enuf flavour

$4.50.
The staff seems do not know how to make a proper noodle ! The dark sauce is too much and too salty to eat !

Ordered delivery medium but came as small..not only 1 time but many times ..very dissapointed.  Your cost of noodles isn't alot and yet you want to cheat your customers.  No wonder 3.5 stars review. Very bad. Just close down

I like their food. However, they have issue with queue / crowd management. Came to the stall and order without any issue. 30 minutes AFTER ORDERING, we are still waiting for the food. The queue number never moves. Meanwhile, I can hear the Grab orders keep coming and they are still taking in order from walk-in customer.

The place is now so crowded with people waiting for their food (both dine-in and deliveries). They should have stopped taking order if they have too much order to handle!

I can see the staff frantically cooking the food with balls flying as they try to move as fast as they can.
Laksa decent , bak Chor mee - mee Poh noodle has no texture - can consider change supplier ? Overall another lucky food outlet in Punggol where choices are limited
